title: help! Harvard T-shirt font
content:
Hey, I'm looking for the typeface used on Harvard Law t-shirts, like this one here:

[http://www.theharvardshop.com/buy/THS-535-GRAY](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023070707/http:/www.theharvardshop.com/buy/THS-535-GRAY "http://www.theharvardshop.com/buy/THS-535-GRAY")

It's got to be common, but I'm pretty awful at identifying typefaces. Thanks for the help.
author: mtsthelen

comments.content:
Search for 'college' tag on Myfonts... [This one](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023070707/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/campus/) for instance, or [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023070707/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/sporting-life/).

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
